listitem.para: C++ Compiler with C++14 Support(I am using MinGW GNU 8.1.0)

section.title: Building Project

literallayout.computeroutput: git clone https://github.com/Kartikei-12/Data-Structure-and-Algorithms.git cd .\Data-Structure-and-Algorithms\ cd cpp14 # For C++ Files mkdir build # Destination of all our build files cmake . -B build # Add -G "GENERATOR" for yuor system is default foes not work cmake --build build

section.para: I have configired for all executables to end up in /bin folder(Find them there).
Build command automatically runs all GoogleTest in tests folder.
